short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify client management: Capture and export info effortlessly in CSV with ClientCSV Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The ClientCSV Exporter Chrome extension streamlines your client management by effortlessly capturing client information and allowing you to export it in a convenient CSV format. Designed with simplicity in mind, this extension empowers you to efficiently organize and share client data with ease.
